testcase.name: MROS Summary Report
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Logging in... Using login URL: https://erp.poundshop.com/login Username: Hitesh Login successful. Step 2: Clicking on Buying +... Step 3: Navigating to MROS Summary Report... Step 4: Focusing on search input... Step 5: Entering Supplier SKU - YTC178818... Step 6: Triggering search... Step 7: Re-confirming input and triggering search again... Step 8: Clicking refresh icon... MROS Summary Report test completed.
